about_the_game: In this demo, you will be using the tiger starting deck to put on larger and larger firework shows. You will be entertaining a crowd of tigers, oxen, rabbits, rats, goats, and dragons and a secret boss at the end. Enjoy this short abbreviated demo of the game Starfire Skies!
detailed_description: In this demo, you will be using the tiger starting deck to put on larger and larger firework shows. You will be entertaining a crowd of tigers, oxen, rabbits, rats, goats, and dragons and a secret boss at the end. Enjoy this short abbreviated demo of the game Starfire Skies!
name: Starfire Skies Demo

short_description: In this real-time, roguelike deckbuilder, you will use firework cards to create a visually stunning fireworks display. Collect cards and build your deck before each show for your specific audience and get the best rating possible, a 5 star show!
